interface.name: wlrandr
interface.description: This is a port of the xRandr extension for weston

request.name: switch_mode
request.description: Asks weston to switch graphical mode for the given output.

enum.name: switch_mode_result
enum.description: The result of a switch_mode request

entry.name: failed
entry.summary: something failed during mode switch (internal error)

entry.name: not_available
entry.summary: the requested mode was not available

request.name: get_output_name
request.description: Asks weston to get output name for the given output.

request.name: get_output_mode_list
request.description: Asks weston to get modelist for the given output.

request.name: get_current_mode
request.description: Asks weston to get modelist for the given output.
